name: Hell Masquerade
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, If you have a blue Digimon in play, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Piercing＞ for the turn. (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
security_effect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
